overview: When Sandya hears Suraj singing on Diwali, she admires and wants to meet (see) him but in vain. She mistakes the actual Suraj and his friends for local thugs. After she gets blinded by chemical accident caused by Suraj, Suraj starts doing all good things to her and she begins to be grateful at last but never to see him again.
title: Angaobasu Thamoi Palli
